entry.summary:

Type:
Price: 90.56

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Acrylic Adhesive, DP8425NS, green, 490 mL, duo-pak

  • 3M Scotch-Weld Acrylic Adhesive DP8425NS is a non-sag, two-part methyl methacrylate (MMA)-based adhesive with a 10:1 mix ratio
  • It has a 25 minute worklife and reaches handling strength in approximately 50 minutes
  • This toughened product provides improved adhesion to many plastics and metals, including those with slightly oily surfaces.

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Low Odour Acrylic Adhesive, DP810NS, tan, 6.76 fl. oz. (200 ml) duo-pak

  • 3M Scotch-Weld Low-Odor Acrylic Adhesive DP810NS is a two-part, 1:1 mix ratio, toughened structural adhesive with less odour than most acrylic adhesives
  • These adhesives have excellent shear and peel strength along with good impact resistance and durability
  • They can quickly bond to most metals, ceramics, rubbers, plastics and wood with minimal surface preparation.

    Product Information

  • Low-odour adhesive is ideal for any setting where harsh fumes or flammability are an issue

  • Bonds most plastics, composites, and metals

entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld DP8407-490ML - Metal Bonder Acrylic Adhesive DP8407NS in Grey 16.56 fl. Oz (490 ml) 7100104975
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Metal Bonder Acrylic Adhesive
Price: 106.54

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Metal Bonder Acrylic Adhesive, DP8407NS, grey, 490 mL

  • 3M Scotch-Weld Metal Bonder Acrylic Adhesive DP8407NS is a non-sag structural adhesive with high overlap shear and peel strength, as well as good impact resistance and durability
  • It has a worklife of 5 to 7 minutes, and reaches handling strength in approximately 25 minutes
  • This adhesive was designed to bond permanently to bare metals with minimal surface preparation, but also bonds well to wide variety of other materials, including most plastics.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Grey
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Metal Bonder Acrylic Adhesive
    Volume 16.56 fl. Oz, 490 ml

    Product Information

  • Bonds to a variety of substrates while resisting corrosion
  • Withstands powder coat and paint bake cycles up to 400ºF (204ºC) for one hour
  • Tough and durable bonds
  • Provides excellent bond strength and impact resistance, even at temperatures down to -40ºF (-40ºC)
  • Moderate non-sag formula won't slump or spread
  • 10:1 mix ratio
